jobDescription: Data AnalystThis position is for a full-time, on-site, e-Commerce product and pricing analyst to support our electronic test equipment distribution website/catalog. It is intended as an entry-level position, but applicants are expected to be technically savvy.  Responsibilities include, but are not limited to: Evaluating and processing inbound vendor communicationsPopulation and reconciliation of product and pricing dataWork with web editors to assure accuracy between front and back end dataSuggesting efficiencies in the context of data flow and reconciliationDesired Qualifications:Advanced Microsoft Excel knowledge relating to: o Pricing Math  o Formulas  o Pivot Tables  o Reconciling Data-sets  o Knowledge of VBA scripting*  Working Microsoft Access knowledge  o Functional knowledge of queries, joins, and data-types  o SQL expressions* Not required. Interested candidates can apply by submitting a resume and a brief cover letter explaining the applicant's interest in the position.  ecommerce, data, excel, analysis
